getting affiliate is like, relatively easy
affiliate just takes time
quick google search says you need:
- 25 Followers
- at least 4 hours streamed in a 30 day period
- streamed on 4 different days in a 30 day period
- average of 3 viewers
but yeah once you become affiliate you can enable points, bits, and subs
each on their own
